title: Whispered Questions & Gently Spoken Answers (Q&A #1)
description:
On this bonus episode of Sleep and Relax ASMR, we debut Q&A! On this episode, my good friend and very talented ASMR content creator Tome by Tome ASMR whispers questions, and I answer them. 

To be featured on the next edition of Q&A, simply download the Anchor app, follow Sleep and Relax ASMR, and submit a voice message!

---

Tome by Tome ASMR:

Anchor: https://anchor.fm/tome-by-tome-asmr
